content.text: Not much, just got home from work. You?
Same here. I'm in grad school right now, working on my thesis.
Oh that sounds really interesting! What are you studying?
That's cool! What do you want to do with your degree after you graduate?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about working in a hospital or clinic.
That's awesome! I'm a nurse at a hospital, so I can tell you a little bit about what it's like.
Oh that's great! I'd love to hear about it.
Well, it's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding. I get to help people every day, and that's what makes it all worth it.
That's awesome. I'm sure you're a great nurse.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the beach, read books, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to go to the beach too, and I love reading books.
Cool! We should go to the beach together sometime.
